page.title: 10SHILLINGSTONE CONSERV.DATA
page.content:
The owner of East and Bere Marsh farms has for the last 30 years created ponds and spinnies and planted many hundreds of trees and shrubs in hedgerows and corners of fields.She has erected bird,mammal nad bat boxes throughout the farm.There is an Exhibition room and school parties are encouraged to visit the farm along with other community groups.The following species of wildlife have been observed: BIRDS 140 70 have nested BUTTERFLIES 32
DRAGONFLIES 14
MAMMALS 32 PLANTS AND TREES 200+
